title.narrative: U.S. Department of Defense, Institutional Capacity Building Programs: Defense Institution Reform Initiative

description.narrative: Saudi Arabia - Defense Transformation Support #6. Conduct both key leader engagements and expert exchanges. Describe a notional Saudi Joint Planning System that would link JCP to JFM to a Joint Warfighting Concept for defending the Kingdom; Understand the current state of HRM activity within the AMOD-EA, influence sound planning where possible, and assess when it might be the right time for ISG HRM experts to return.

description.narrative: Saudi Arabia - Defense Transformation Support #7.
